statements: SELECT * FROM vendor_performance_data ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, performance_rating FROM vendor_performance_data WHERE delivery_time < 5;
SELECT vendor_name, quality_rating FROM vendor_performance_data WHERE performance_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM vendor_performance_data WHERE vendor_id = 3;
SELECT vendor_name, delivery_time FROM vendor_performance_data ORDER BY delivery_time ASC, vendor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_performance_data WHERE performance_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, quality_rating FROM vendor_performance_data WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY quality_rating ASC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, performance_rating, quality_rating FROM vendor_performance_data WHERE delivery_time < 5 OR quality_rating < 3 ORDER BY vendor_id;
SELECT vendor_name, performance_rating FROM vendor_performance_data WHERE quality_rating BETWEEN 3.5 AND 4.5 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC, vendor_name;
SELECT MAX(performance_rating), MIN(delivery_time) FROM vendor_performance_data;
SELECT * FROM VendorPerformanceData WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, performance_score FROM VendorPerformanceData ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, performance_score FROM VendorPerformanceData WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM SupplierRelationships WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT supplier_name, relationship_status FROM SupplierRelationships ORDER BY supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM VendorPerformanceData WHERE vendor_id = 1 ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, performance_score FROM VendorPerformanceData WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, relationship_status FROM SupplierRelationships WHERE relationship_status = 'active';
SELECT vendor_name, performance_score FROM VendorPerformanceData WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY performance_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM VendorPerformanceData vp JOIN SupplierRelationships sr ON vp.vendor_id = sr.supplier_id WHERE vp.performance_score > 70 AND sr.relationship_status = 'active';
SELECT vendor_name, order_date FROM vendor_performance_data WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM supplier_relationships WHERE supplier_id > 3;
SELECT vendor_name, delivery_status FROM vendor_performance_data ORDER BY delivery_status DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM supplier_relationships WHERE contact_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT vendor_name, order_date, delivery_status FROM vendor_performance_data WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered' AND order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vendor_performance_data;
SELECT vendor_name, order_date FROM vendor_performance_data WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM supplier_relationships WHERE supplier_id = 3;

SELECT vendor_name, order_date, delivery_status, rating FROM vendor_performance_data INNER JOIN performance_metrics ON vendor_performance_data.vendor_id = performance_metrics.vendor_id AND vendor_performance_data.order_id = performance_metrics.order_id WHERE rating >= 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM vendor_performance_data GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING total_orders > 5 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_performance_data;
SELECT vendor_name, rating FROM vendor_performance_data ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person_email FROM vendor_performance_data WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, order_date, status FROM purchase_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_performance_data WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY vendor_id ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, rating FROM vendor_performance_data WHERE rating < 3;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person_email FROM vendor_performance_data WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;

SELECT vendor_performance_data.vendor_name, purchase_orders.total_amount FROM vendor_performance_data JOIN purchase_orders ON vendor_performance_data.vendor_id = purchase_orders.vendor_id WHERE purchase_orders.status = 'Pending';
SELECT vendor_name, payment_date, amount FROM vendor_performance_data JOIN payment_records ON vendor_performance_data.vendor_id = payment_records.vendor_id ORDER BY payment_date DESC, amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_performance_data;
SELECT vendor_id, performance_rating, performance_date FROM vendor_performance_data ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_relationships WHERE relationship_type = 'Supplier of the Year';
SELECT supplier_id, metric_name, metric_value, metric_date FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 8.0;
SELECT vendor_id, overall_rating, reliability_rating, quality_rating, delivery_rating FROM vendor_ratings ORDER BY overall_rating DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, supplier_id, performance_rating FROM vendor_performance_data WHERE performance_rating > 4 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC
SELECT contact_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM vendor_contacts WHERE contact_phone IS NOT NULL ORDER BY contact_name ASC
SELECT supplier_id, metric_name, metric_value, metric_date FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE metric_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY metric_date DESC
SELECT supplier_id, relationship_type, start_date, end_date FROM supplier_relationships WHERE end_date IS NULL ORDER BY supplier_id, relationship_type
SELECT vendor_id, overall_rating, reliability_rating, quality_rating, delivery_rating FROM vendor_ratings WHERE overall_rating >= 3.5 ORDER BY vendor_id
